friend void swap( stop_source&amp; lhs, stop_source&amp; rhs ) noexcept;
}}

Overloads the {{lc|std::swap}} algorithm for {{lc|std::stop_source}}. Exchanges the stop-state of {{c|lhs}} with that of {{c|rhs}}. Effectively calls {{c|lhs.swap(rhs)}}.

{{cpp/hidden friend|std::stop_source}}

{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|{{tt|stop_source}}s to swap}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
